tool_description: Creates and manages categorization rules based on transaction patterns, keywords, merchants, and amounts to automatically assign expense categories.

rule_type.description: Type of rule to create or manage: keyword, merchant, amount_range, description_pattern

rule_action.description: Action to perform: create, update, delete, list

category_name.description: Target category for the rule (required for create/update actions)

rule_criteria.description: Specific criteria for the rule (keywords, merchant names, amount ranges, or patterns)

rule_priority.description: Priority level for rule application (1-10, higher numbers take precedence)

error_messages: Invalid rule type: Use one of [keyword, merchant, amount_range, description_pattern].
Invalid rule action: Use one of [create, update, delete, list].
Missing required fields: For create/update actions, both category_name and rule_criteria are required.
Invalid priority level: Priority must be an integer between 1 and 10.
Rule criteria format error: Ensure rule_criteria matches the expected format for the specified rule_type.
usage: Specify the rule_type and rule_action. For create/update operations, provide category_name and rule_criteria. Optionally set rule_priority to control rule application order.

operation_status.description: Status of the rule operation (success, failed, or partial)

active_rules.description: List of currently active categorization rules

affected_rules.description: Number of rules affected by the operation
